name: frontend
description: ## File structure ``` |   index.html |   .gitignore |   package.json |   README.md | +---css |   |   conversation.css | +---js |   |   apiHandler.js |   |   conversation.js |   |   init.js |   |   panel.js |   |   services.js | ```

scripts.worker: babel src/js/apiHandler.js -d dist && babel src/js/notification.js -d dist
scripts.compile: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run worker && npm run build-css

author: shikhar
